resources.string: Please use our app to scan my QR code and become my owner
Please help me connect to network, and i will be able to do more
Connection failed, please help me solve the problem.
From this day forward, you are my owner and I will always keep you company
I heard you calling me, how can I help?
My battery is running low, please help me recharge.
I am going to sleep, see you next time.
I am waiting for scanning QR code!
QR scan success,I am conecting to the wifi
fail to open the camera，please contact our customer service
The camera can not work，please contact our customer service
Attempting to connect,please waiting for the WiFi password transmission
Mobile phone connection succeed, waiting for the WiFi password transmission
yeah I am already on line,feel like being smarter
I have accessed to network, feel so good
connection failed, could you reselect a wifi or input the password
sorry, connection failure, you may reselect a wifi or input the password
Incorrect username or password! Please set again.
Internect information is recieved. Connection started.
I am not bound to this phone, please create a QR code with the phone binding me now.
My connection was interrupted, please help me connect to network
Please help me connect to network, without a connection, my capabilities are very limited
Please help me connect to network, and i will be able to do more
It feels nice to be connected
我断网咯，请帮我连接网络吧
请帮我联网，让我可以做更多的事情
连不上网我只能发挥能力的百分之一
连接网络成功，我感觉充满力量
Attempting to connect,please wait a moment
There is a new version for the robot's system. It is upgrading now. Please don't turn off the robot.
You can still use the robot. Or you can reboot the robot and restart upgrade.
Upgrade was successful.The robot is restarting. This process may take 30 seconds.
Your network access is limited, please connect no limited WIFI hotspot
Successfullly restarted. I am at your service now.
I have logged in the server
I am now conneting to the server
Not yet. Please connect me the server
I haven\'t been connected to network. Please help me
I am not connected to the internet. Please connect me to the network
I have been connected to the network
I am connected to network now
the serial number does not match
Please put the QR code within 20 to 40 centimeters from my camera. You can put it down when you hear the notification
%s,this is the Wifi I am connected to
the Wifi I am connected to is %s
I still have %s percent of power
only %s percent of electricity is available. please recharge me
I only have %s percent of power now. Please recharge me
I am running out of power. Only %s percnet is left now
I need recharging. only %s percent of power is left
Plenty. I still have %s percent of power
I haven\'t been bound to any one
I am not bound to anyone currently. You can become my owner by binding me
No one, I am available now
the app I am using is %s
%s, this is the app I am using
The app I am using is %s
The app I am using is %s
Failed to upgrade because of insufficient system storage space. Please uninstall some builted-in applications in your alpha app first and then restart the robot
The function Using While Charging has been turned off. If you need me to perform an action, please activate the function
Now you can talk with me in English，you can say hello alpha to wake me up.
I am now changing to the Chinese version. Please hold on a second.
I am now changing to the English version. Please hold on a second.
Now you can talk with me in Chinese，you can say hello alpha to wake me up.
You haven\'t taken new photos recently
I don't have much storage space now. Please clean it up.
I don't have enough storage space now. Please clean it up.
Hi, I am Alpha. Nice to meet you!
Finally you bring me home. I enjoy having fun with you. If I doze off, you can say hello Alpha to wake me up.
I have prepared a dance for you, please enjoy my show.
You can stop me by saying Hello alpha or pat my head.
Thank you! Hope you like my show. Now you can download the Alpha 2 APP from the User guide and help me connect to the Internet.
The robot is overheating. Please let it have a rest so that it can cool down.
Sorry, you can only upload log again %d minutes later.
The log has been successfully gotten.

string-array.name: sleep
string-array.item: ok, talk to you later
fine, I will take a break, bye
alright, I'm gonna take a nap, see you

string-array.name: robotSayHello
string-array.item: hello，I am alpha
hi, nice to meet you

string-array.name: robotIntroduced
string-array.item: hello, I'm Alpha, a robot with charm and talent, my wish is to be with you
hello,I'm Alpha, my only mission is to accomny you because you are my best friend
Nice to see you, I'm Alpha, your personal robot with good looking and a smart brain, my hobby is to be with you.
Hi, finally you bring me home, I'm Alpha, I enjoy having fun with you and never quarrel with you.

string-array.name: robotGuideAPP
string-array.item: please download our app from instructions and help me connect to the internet,and you will find a lot of fun
hey, follow the instruction, scan the QR code and help me connect to network, then we can download apps to explore more functions

string-array.name: robotShutDown
string-array.item: Ok, see you next time
No problem. Bye now
Sure, Good bye
well, I'm gonna sleep.
OK, I gotta have a sleep and dream of you

string-array.name: robotManualShutDown
string-array.item: See you!
Catch you later.
So long!
Good bye!

string-array.name: netSuccess
string-array.item: connection successful
yeah I'm already on line,feel like being smarter
connection succeed, thank you and kiss you
I have accessed to network, feel so good

string-array.name: netShutdown
string-array.item: My connection was interrupted, please help me re-connect to the network
ah! Network unavailable now. Help me connect to it
oops, the network broke down, please try to restore it
look! no network, could you help me connect to it

string-array.name: robotWakeup
string-array.item: I am here
Hey, whats up?
hey, I see you, boss
How can I help?
oh, you looking for me?

string-array.name: offline_wifi
string-array.item: I am connected to %s
I have been connected to %s
the Wifi I am connected to is %s
well, I think it should be %s

string-array.name: offline_app
string-array.item: I am using %s
%s, this is the app I am using
good question, what i'm using is %s

string-array.name: offline_have_loginned
string-array.item: login completed
I have logined
I have logged in the server
Yes, I have login in the server
Ho ho, login succeed,so easy

string-array.name: offline_have_notlogin
string-array.item: login failed, let me access to the server please
oh well, I couldn't log in. Could you try again?
I couldn't log in, let's try again

string-array.name: offline_bound_to
string-array.item: I have been bound to %s
I am now bound to %s
yeah, already binded by %s
Actually %s has bound me now

string-array.name: offline_unbounded
string-array.item: I haven't been bound to any one
No one, I am available now
No one is binding me now
no one bound me. Absolutely no one

string-array.name: offline_net_connect_success
string-array.item: I have been connected to the network
I am connected to the Internet now
Network connection successful
yeah, i have access to the network

string-array.name: offline_net_connect_fail
string-array.item: No, my connection was interrupted
no connection now, oh baby blue

string-array.name: offline_power_lower
string-array.item: only %s percent of electricity is available. please recharge me
I am out of battery. I need to be charged
I only have %s percent of power now. Please recharge me
I am running out of power. Only %s percent of power left
I need recharging. only %s percent of power is left
lacking power,only %s percent, you need to charge me

string-array.name: offline_power_5_40
string-array.item: only %s percent of power is available.
there are only %s percent of power left
Well, %s percent, charge me if you love me
oh wow, %s percent of power is left, you gotta charge me

string-array.name: offline_power_40_75
string-array.item: I still have %s percent of power
I got %s percent of power left, take it easy
I am still energetic with %s percent of power
let me see... Um... %s percent is left

string-array.name: offline_power_full
string-array.item: %s percent of power is available, I feel powerful
Plenty. I still have %s percent of power
There is still %s percent of power now, don\'t worry
still %s percent of power, i feel good

string-array.name: offline_capacity_higher
string-array.item: %s G of storage now availble
still have %s G, feel so cool
there is %s G of storage available,enough for now
not bad, %s G is quite enough

string-array.name: offline_capacity_lower
string-array.item: only %s G storage left, please clean up
only %s G of storage left, you need to clean up some space
%s G of storage left now, why not free up more space
my storage has only %s G left, definitely not cool, could you free up some space

string-array.name: offline_HasPicture
string-array.item: Sure, you can check it on your phone now
Sure, just a second
Sure, here you go
No problem, wait a moment
yes, you can check it on your phone

string-array.name: offline_NoPicture
string-array.item: No new photo
you just didn't take any pictures
I'm sorry, it seems you haven't taken any photo
well, you didn't take any pictures
buddy, you just didn't take any pictures, you can take one now
